explanation: The condition 'if x>a+1 and x<=b:' wrongly treats rank A+1 as guaranteed a T-shirt. It should check if x is greater than A (x>a) and at most B, so that rank A+1 falls into the random-selection range with probability C/(B-A). I fixed that single comparison to 'x>a'. No external diff was needed.
fixed_code:
a,b,c,x=list(map(int,input().split()))
ans=1.0
if x>a and x<=b:
    ans=c/(b-a)
elif x>b:
    ans=0.0
print('%.10f'%ans)
